pages.text: Let's take a look at some of the more civilised inhabitants of $(thing)Celeve$()
pages.title: NPCs

pages.text: $(thing)Celevian Lottomen$() can be found in Celevian Lotto Balloons. They sell the same wares as the other lottomen
$(thing)Toy Merchants$() can be found in Toy Towers. When leveled up, they sell a small selection of useful items, including the Gravitator and the Toy Gyrocopter
